name: Oni Survivors Remastered
description:
Oni Survivor Remastered is a little Remake of "Oni Survivor", made by Cablown, an action game where you have to fight tons of ennemies to stay alive!

Choose your powers up carefully in order to maximize your chances of winning !

MODIFICATIONS : 

-New Maps

-New Levels : Easy/Normal/Hard

-UI Sound Design

-New Graphics for Boss

-New Musics

-Prototype of ToolTip 

-Particles Effects for LevelUp

CREDITS : 

Original Game : https://cablown.itch.io/oni-survivors

Original Author : Cablown 

LINKS : 

Github : https://github.com/Brondold/VampireSurvivorRemake

Portfolio : https://timotheebourson.wixsite.com/portfolio
